game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.description: The lost artifact of Eldoria has been stolen by a group of thieves. They were last seen near the Dark Woods. You must retrieve it and bring it back to King Eldor.
game.reward: 5000 gold coins and a Legendary Sword

tasks.description: Find the location of the thieves' hideout using the clues they left behind.
Defeat the group of thieves and recover the stolen artifact.
Return the recovered artifact to King Eldor.
